    About Me

    I am a Research Assistant and second-year PhD student in AI Innovation Lab, which is directed by Dr. David Doermann. My research focused on computer vision, nature language processing and document analysis areas. Recently, I am working on chart information extraction and scientific figure-text linking problem.

    Previously, I am an undergraduate student in University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC)., majored in Electronic Science and Technology.

    My Resume could be found HERE.
